com.raweng.built

Class BuiltLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raweng.built.BuiltLocation

  • public class BuiltLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to set location while creating new object or used for making geo point related queries.
    Author:
    built.io. Inc

      • getCurrentLocation

        public static void getCurrentLocation(android.content.Context context,
                      android.app.Activity activity,
                      com.raweng.built.BuiltLocationCallback callback)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        To fetch current location.
        Parameters:
        context - application context.
        activity - Activity instance.
        callback - BuiltLocationCallback instance.

        Note : User need to add following permission in manifest.

      • To access precise location from location sources such as GPS, cell towers, and Wi-Fi.
      • To access precise location from location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi.


        • Example :
         BuiltLocation.getCurrentLocation(context, activity, new BuiltLocationCallback() {

    @Override
    public void onCompletion(ResponseType responseType, BuiltLocation builtLocationInstance, BuiltError builtError) {
        if(builtError == null && builtLocationInstance != null){
            Double longitude =  builtLocationInstance.getLongitude();
            Double latitude  = builtLocationInstance.getLatitude();
         }
     }
 });
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getLatitude

        public java.lang.Double getLatitude()
        Returns latitude value.
        Returns:
        latitude.

        Example :
         BuiltLocation.getCurrentLocation(context, activity, new BuiltLocationCallback() {

    @Override
    public void onCompletion(ResponseType responseType, BuiltLocation builtLocationInstance, BuiltError builtError) {
          if(builtError == null && builtLocationInstance != null){
            Double latitude  = builtLocationInstance.getLatitude();
          }
    }
 });

      • getLongitude

        public java.lang.Double getLongitude()
        Returns longitude value.
        Returns:
        longitude.

        Example :
         BuiltLocation.getCurrentLocation(context, activity, new BuiltLocationCallback() {

     @Override
     public void onCompletion(ResponseType responseType, BuiltLocation builtLocationInstance, BuiltError builtError) {
        if(builtError == null && builtLocationInstance != null){
           Double longitude =  builtLocationInstance.getLongitude();
        }
     }
 });

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(java.lang.Double latitude,
               java.lang.Double longitude)
        Sets latitude and longitude value.
        Parameters:
        latitude - latitude.
        longitude - longitude.

        Example :
         BuiltLocation loc = new BuiltLocation();
 loc.setLocation(37.74, -122.44);
